mapper.select: SELECT id , us.first_name , us.last_name , us.gender , us.date_birth , us.contact , us.profile_resource_img_id , us.email , us.description , us.create_date , us.modify_date , us.status , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = us.create_by) as "create_by" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = us.modify_by) as "modify_by" FROM user_info us where us.status != #{status}
